column1: What is the purpose of the try-catch block in Java?;To execute code conditionally
Which of the following are access modifiers in Java?;public
What is the default value of a float variable in Java?;0
Which of the following are valid loop structures in Java?;for
What is the main purpose of the static keyword in Java?;To define a constant value
column2: To create a static block of code
column3: To make a variable shared across all instances of a class
column5: To make a method or variable independent of instances;multiple
